page.title: 09Agriculture
page.content: Most of the farms in this area are dairy farms.In some farms they grow wheat.Most of the farms range from one hundrexd to one hundred and fifty acres.The dairy farmers in this area own about one to two hundred freison cows.The farm houses and yards are mainly elderly there are only a few recently built farms.Some farms have milking systems which looked qute new.The ground was covered in cow manure.The farms had hay scattered on the floor amongst dry cow dung.The farms also had dogs and lambs.The farms had old fashiopned washing machines and furniture.The farms are mostly surrounded by barbed wire fencing.The ground was generally very fertile indeed.
